item.title: The elder-care crisis is about to get much worse as millions more Americans turn 85
item.description: The “silver tsunami” is about to crest. Watch out for the undertow.

item.title: Consumer sentiment improves on signs of ‘modest improvement’ in economy
item.description: Sentiment readings are continuing to inch higher.

item.title: Trump says Big Oil will invest $100 billion in Venezuela as Chevron, Exxon come to the White House today. Here’s what to watch.
item.description: President Donald Trump has invited U.S. oil companies to a meeting at the White House on Friday, which is expected to begin at 2:30 p.m. Eastern time.

item.title: Would you rather make $120K working from home or $240K being in an office every day? Here’s what people are saying.
item.description: The latest stage in the remote work vs. in-office debate sees people arguing on TikTok and Reddit over whether to take a remote job paying half as muc...

item.title: Gloom, Boom and Doom author recommends buying gold but not bitcoin
item.description: Bonds offering 4% yields are losing their purchasing power when real inflation is somewhere between 6% to 12%, according to celebrated economist
